heading: Television in education.
general-note: Here are entered works about the use of television in education. Works about television programs that are intended to impart knowledge and information, including those for classroom viewing, are entered under. Educational television programs. with appropriate geographic, topical, and/or form subdivisions.  Works about television programs that use a structured format to teach or train the audience are entered under. Instructional television programs. with appropriate geographic, topical, and/or form subdivisions..
